title: Alchemist

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Extract the essence from a player.
- Brew a potion from all your collected essence. Usable once you have 3 essence, and at least two must be from non-Mafia targets.
- Use a brewed potion on a target.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- All your abilities are usable at day and night.
- Extracting essence does not notify your target, nor notify you of their role.
- When brewing a potion, you lose all collected essence. The host gives the potion an effect, which is a mix of all the abilities from the essence you collected, which may be slightly modified.
- If you die with potions left, or while brewing a potion, your potions (plus the one you were brewing) become usable by any member of the Mafia.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone that will not submit to the Mafia.

desc:
Post 3815
*This is no place for someone without magic abilities! I'll show you where you can go!*
*Hi, welcome to the Mafia tryouts! Weren't there supposed to be two of you?*
*Oh, of course they didn't come with me...*
